channel.title: [REL] Paladin Armor With Drop Models
channel.description:
That is right guys and gals! I have made drop models for this armor set and will be letting you all take part in having it! I have included all the models needed such as all drop models and equip models so there is nothing missing. Inside the archive there is also the equipment INTs such as zoom/rotations/offsets and the rest. The model part is up to you because I have no idea what model is your highest and what model ID they will be when you pack in into your cache. Picture below!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/x9t4k8d.png[/img]
Links: [URL=http://"https://www.mediafire.com/folder/undefined/"]Mediafire[/URL] [URL=http://"http://uppit.com/2ebmwzznf0hg/Black_Paladin_Armor_Set.rar"]Uppit[/URL] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/78894730/Black%20Paladin%20Armor%20Set.rar"]Dropbox[/URL]
By the way I am Chronicscape on R-S and RL so don't dare say I copied this because its my work thanks.

item.title: [REL] Paladin Armor With Drop Models
item.dc:creator: @mogging mogging
item.description:
@mogging wrote:

amy_webb:

Not dumb at all, thanks for asking though. I did say “usually” so i don’t see why you’re being aggressive.

Beacuse you were basically saying that those models were in the cache… Next time do read before you post lol.

item.title: [REL] Paladin Armor With Drop Models
item.dc:creator: @mogging mogging
item.description:
@mogging wrote:

amy_webb:

The cache usually has both equip and drop models as they’re required for inventory display, it only takes a second to reposition it but you should have been able to find them in the cache.

You do realize that this was a COSMETIC right? I had turned into an actual piece of armor with the addition of the drop models made in Meta… Now how dumb do you feel?

Read full topic
